alert.note: Alert for Dawson; Fannin; Gilmer; Lumpkin; Pickens; Union (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 01 at 7:21AM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Lumpkin, southeastern Gilmer, central Dawson, northeastern Pickens, southern Union and southeastern Fannin Counties through 745 AM EDT... At 721 AM EDT, a line of strong thunderstorms was along a line extending from near Pisgah to near Sequoyah Lake to Jasper, and moving east at 50 mph. HAZARD...40 to 50 mph wind, frequent cloud to ground lightning and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Heavy rain may cause temporary street flooding especially in poor drainage areas. Locations impacted include... Dahlonega, Jasper, Suches, Amicalola Falls State Park, Sequoyah Lake, Camp Merrill, Woods Hole Shelter, Fausett Lake, Springer Mountain Shelter, Len Foote Hike Inn, Black Gap Shelter, Lake Tamarack, Auraria, Stover Creek Shelter, Hawk Mountain Shelter, Porter Springs, Turners Corner, Nimblewill, Blood Mountain Shelter and Gaddistown. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately. If you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning. Motorists should slow down and be prepared for possible loss of control due to hydroplaning. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 900 AM EDT for north central Georgia.

area.areaDesc: Dawson; Fannin; Gilmer; Lumpkin; Pickens; Union
